# readOnly

**Type Property**

The permission option the system uses to control whether a user can grant read-only access.

## Declaration

```swift
static var readOnly: CKSharingParticipantPermissionOption { get }
```

## Configuring the options

- **any**: The permission option the system uses to control whether a user can grant read-only or write access.
- **readWrite**: The permission option the system uses to control whether a user can grant write access.

items.description: The permission option the system uses to control whether a user can grant read-only or write access.
